comment.author: 79649209@N06
comment._content: This photo is of Dr Benjamin Gilmore Wilson; the baby he is holding (his first child) was Harry Gilmore Wilson who also became a doctor. The photo would date from 1916/1917. Dr Benjamin Gilmore Wilson's brother (Harry Gilmore) had been killed at Pozieres, France in July 1915.  Dr Harry Gilmore Wilson graduated from the University of Queensland and became a specialist physician and cardiologist who practised in Ipswich (Queensland) and Brisbane for many years, to the 1980s.

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/79649209@N06] THanks for all that information about this image. We'll be adding that to our catalogue record. It is wonderful when knowledge about our collection material can be added to and expanded!
